auth.alreadyHaveLoginCode: I already have a login code
auth.needNewLoginCode: I need a new login code
auth.signupTooltip: If this is your first time here, just enter your email above and click Log in. You will receive a 6 digit code via email that you can use to log in. Afterwards you may set up a password too if you like.
auth.forgotOrNoPassword: Don't have a password yet, or just forgot it?
auth.passwordTooltip: Use an email login code to access your settings and you can set up a new password there.

decks.name: Name
decks.noCards: There are no cards yet in this deck. Add, import or generate cards to start practicing.

cards.importFromSheetsInfo: Copy-paste cards from Excel or Google sheets. The first column will be the source language and the second column is the target language. If selected for the deck, the third column is the alternative phrasing.
cards.importExportedDeckInfo: Import cards from a file that was previously exported from FrazeWise.
cards.importSuccess: Cards imported successfully, please scroll down, check the cards and click Save.
cards.unableToImport: Unable to import cards. Please check the format of the file.
cards.remainingCount: You can add {{count}} more cards to this deck
cards.deckIsFull: This deck is full, you cannot add more cards
cards.exportDeckInfo: Export all the cards from this deck to a file that can be imported back into FrazeWise. You can also share this file with others.
cards.generateCardsInfo1: Generate cards using AI. Please note that this is an experimental feature and may not work perfectly.
cards.generateCardsInfo2: You can generate up to 100 cards at a time, also depending on the size of your deck. The generated cards can be added to the end of the deck.
cards.generateCardsInfo3: Please choose the topic in English, the level of difficulty and the number of cards you want to generate.
cards.tooFewRemaining: Your deck is almost full, please choose another deck to generate cards to.
cards.generateSuccess: Cards generated successfully, please scroll down, check the cards and click Save.
cards.generateError: Couldn't generate cards. Please try again later or with different parameters.
cards.generateLoading: The AI is working its magic, please wait...

validationErrors.DECK_CARD_LANGUAGE_MISMATCH: Deck and card language do not match
